sentences.en: a dress that hooks at the back
sentences.cn: 从后背用钩扣的连衣裙

sentences.en: a satellite hook-up between the major European networks
sentences.cn: 欧洲各主要电视网通过卫星的联播

sentences.en: Ali was hooked up to an electrocardiograph.
sentences.cn: 阿里被连到了心电图仪上。

sentences.en: cigarette ads designed to hook young people
sentences.cn: 专为吸引年轻人而设计的香烟广告

sentences.en: Hang your coat up on the hook.
sentences.cn: 把你的大衣挂在衣钩上。

sentences.en: He baited his hook with pie.
sentences.cn: 他在鱼钩上装了点馅饼作钓饵。

sentences.en: He counted on his friends to get him off the hook.
sentences.cn: 他指望朋友们帮他摆脱困境.

sentences.en: He delivered a right hook to his opponent's jaw.
sentences.cn: 他给了对方下巴一记右钩拳.

sentences.en: he fell hook, line, and sinker for this year's April Fool joke.
sentences.cn: 在今年的愚人节他成了十足的受愚弄对象。

sentences.en: He felt a fish pull at his hook.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到有条鱼在扯钓钩。

sentences.en: He tried to hook his leg over the branch.
sentences.cn: 他试图用腿钩住树枝。

sentences.en: he's on the hook for about $9.5 million.
sentences.cn: 他对约950万美元负责。

sentences.en: hooked up with the wrong crowd.
sentences.cn: 与一帮坏人勾结在一起

sentences.en: I hooked a 20-pound salmon last week.
sentences.cn: 我上周钓到一条20磅重的鲑鱼。

sentences.en: I lied to get him off the hook.
sentences.cn: 为了让他摆脱麻烦我撒了谎。

sentences.en: I was caught hook, line and sinker.
sentences.cn: 我被深深吸引了。

sentences.en: Just hook the bucket onto the rope and lower it down.
sentences.cn: 只要把桶拴在绳子上往下送就可以了。

sentences.en: let me off the hook with a mild reprimand.
sentences.cn: 温和地责备后便放过了我

sentences.en: Lewis desperately needs to keep clear of Ruddock's big left hook.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯无论如何得躲开拉多克凌厉的左钩拳才行。

sentences.en: Make sure that the hook is fully screwed in.
sentences.cn: 看看钩子是否已完全旋进去了.

sentences.en: One of his jackets hung from a hook.
sentences.cn: 他的一件夹克衫挂在衣钩上。

sentences.en: Ruth hooked her arm through Tony’s.
sentences.cn: 露丝挽住了托尼的手臂。

sentences.en: swallowed the excuse hook, line, and sinker.
sentences.cn: 完全相信了这个借口

sentences.en: The driveway makes a hook around an old tree.
sentences.cn: 车道绕过一棵老树来了个急转弯.

sentences.en: They intend to get their way, by hook or by crook.
sentences.cn: 为达到目的，他们不择手段。

sentences.en: they were going to move out rather than let Mel get his hooks into them.
sentences.cn: 他们打算搬出去而不是让梅尔控制他们。

sentences.en: Tom hung his coat on the hook behind the door.
sentences.cn: 汤姆把外套挂在门后的衣钩上。

sentences.en: Water and electric hook-ups are available and facilities are good.
sentences.cn: 水和电都可以接通，设施也很不错。

sentences.en: We fell for it hook, line, and sinker.
sentences.cn: 我们对它完全是一见倾心。

sentences.en: We hooked the trailer to the back of the car.
sentences.cn: 我们把拖车挂在汽车尾部。

sentences.en: We’ve got a CD player, but it’s not hooked up yet.
sentences.cn: 我们有一台激光唱片播放机，不过还没有接通电源。

sentences.en: You can hook up the dress at the back.
sentences.cn: 你可以把女衫从背后扣住.
